verses.name: Amos 2:9
verses.text: Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.

verses.name: Amos 2:10
verses.text: Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.

verses.name: Amos 2:11
verses.text: And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites. Is it not even thus, O ye children of Israel? saith the Lord.
